text: Before I Hang is a 1940 American science fiction horror movie directed by Nick Grinde and starring Boris Karloff, Bruce Bennett, Evelyn Keyes, Edward Van Sloan, Ben Taggart, Don Beddoe. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1940 movies Category:1940s science fiction movies Category:1940s horror movies Category:American science fiction horror movies Category:Movies directed by Nick Grinde
title: Before I Hang
